channel.title: How to change weapon stances in a PI source
channel.description: hi, I want to change the balmung to its proper stance, as now it is set to be held like a scimitar and I would like it to be help like the dharoks axe. If anyone can help me find out what file this is in I would be of great apprecation and thanks.

item.title: How to change weapon stances in a PI source
item.dc:creator: @tigman9 tigman9
item.description:
@tigman9 wrote:

word up, thanks homie

Read full topic

item.title: How to change weapon stances in a PI source
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

CombatAssistant.java in this method:

Hereâ€™s an example:

case 15241: c.playerStandIndex = 12155; c.playerWalkIndex = 12154; c.playerRunIndex = 12154; break;
Or with a name of an item:

if(weaponName.contains("bow")) { c.playerStandIndex = 808; c.playerWalkIndex = 819; c.playerRunIndex = 824; return; }

c.playerStandIndex = 808; would be the standing animation for the item.

c.playerWalkIndex = 819; would be the walking animation for the item.

c.playerRunIndex = 824; would be the running animation for the item.

Read full topic
